goals.title: Stop poverty
goals.subtitle: End poverty in all its forms everywhere.

goals.title: Zero hunger
goals.subtitle: End hunger, achieve food security and improved nutrition and promote sustainable agriculture.

goals.title: Good health
goals.subtitle: Ensure healthy lives and promote well-being for all at all ages.

goals.title: Quality education
goals.subtitle: Ensure inclusive and equitable quality education and promote lifelong learning opportunities for all.

goals.title: Gender equality
goals.subtitle: Achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls.

goals.title: Clean water
goals.subtitle: Ensure availability and sustainable management of water and sanitation for all.

goals.title: Affordable energy
goals.subtitle: Ensure access to affordable, reliable, sustainable and modern energy for all.

goals.title: Economic growth
goals.subtitle: Promote sustained, inclusive and sustainable economic growth, full and productive employment and decent work for all.

goals.title: Industry innovation
goals.subtitle: Build resilient infrastructure, promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and foster innovation.

goals.title: Reduced inequalities
goals.subtitle: Reduce inequality within and among countries.

goals.title: Sustainable communities
goals.subtitle: Make cities and human settlements inclusive, safe, resilient and sustainable.

goals.title: Responsible consumption
goals.subtitle: Ensure sustainable consumption and production patterns.

goals.title: Climate action
goals.subtitle: Take urgent action to combat climate change and its impacts.

goals.title: Life below water
goals.subtitle: Conserve and sustainably use the oceans, seas and marine resources for sustainable development.

goals.title: Life on land
goals.subtitle: Protect, restore and promote sustainable use of ecosystems.

goals.title: Peace
goals.subtitle: Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, provide access to justice for all and build effective, accountable and inclusive institutions at all levels.

goals.title: Partnerships
goals.subtitle: Strengthen the means of implementation and revitalize the global partnership for sustainable development.
